text: Yevhen Cheberko (; born 23 January 1998) is a professional Ukrainian football midfielder who currently plays for LASK in the Austrian Football Bundesliga. ==Club career== Cheberko is a product of the UFK Dnipropetrovsk and FC Dnipo (first trainer was Ihor Khomenko) Youth Sportive School Systems. He made his debut as a substituted player in a second half-time for FC Dnipro in the match against FC Volyn Lutsk on 24 July 2016 in the Ukrainian Premier League. ==International career== He made his national team debut on 7 October 2020 in a friendly against France. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! rowspan=2 | Club ! rowspan=2 | Season ! colspan=3 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Continental ! colspan=2 | Other ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
